5#ifndef CYD_UI_TEMPLATE_STR_BUFFER_H
6#define CYD_UI_TEMPLATE_STR_BUFFER_H
7
8#include <string>
9
21template<std::size_t length>
22struct template_str_buffer {
23#pragma clang diagnostic push
24#pragma ide diagnostic ignored "google-explicit-constructor"
25
26 // Needs to be implicit if it's to work with literal operators
27 consteval template_str_buffer(const char(&str)[length]) noexcept {
28 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i) {
29 data[i] = str[i];
30 }
31 }
32
33#pragma clang diagnostic pop
34
35 char data[length] = {0};
36 constexpr static size_t count = length - sizeof(char);
37};
38
39#endif //CYD_UI_TEMPLATE_STR_BUFFER_H
